column1: Uchi////Dessert: The fried milk is a creation I didn't think existed or would have been thought to be created.  Basically its 4 fried pillows of puff pastry filled with custard
column4: and thin chocolate wafers was a sight for sore eyes!  You would think this combination would be over the top sweet
column5: but it wasn't.  It was a great amalgam of warm + cold
